# vagrant/

Starting the server.

```bash
# istall the plugin:
$ vagrant install plugin vagrant-vbguest

# go:
$ vagrant up
$ vagrant ssh

# also:
$ vagrant halt
$ vagrant reload -provision
$ vagrant destroy

# in the box, stop/start mysqld:
$ sudo service mysqld start
```
**By the way, this vagrant-puppet-box was generated by https://puphpet.com/.**
